backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific yearly-summary logic fix to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to human-written summaries of their roles in the app.
frontend/DEVELOPMENT.md: Developer guide with prerequisites and steps for local development and deployment on the Internet Computer.
frontend/env.json: Runtime environment config specifying the Internet Identity URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, theming, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing key features of the Goals Dashboard and linking to the development guide.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the main GoalsDashboard view and initializes the global Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/CenteredNotifica: Timed, centered overlay alert component that auto-dismisses after a configurable duration.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyCompletio: Complex modal handling monthly completion celebrations, camera capture flows, image processing, and save notifications.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyMemorySha: Dropdown UI for sharing monthly memory images across social platforms with download and caption-copy helpers.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyProgressD: SVG donut component showing monthly progress as a circular percentage indicator.
frontend/src/components/MonthSelectionMo: Dialog-based month picker with a 12-month grid and confirm/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/YearlySummaryTab: React component that displays a yearly goals summary table with checkbox tracking, monthly memories, and celebration modal logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
Hook wrapping useCamera to manage camera readiness, stream handling, preview state, and photo capture for celebration selfies.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, utilities, and component styles including summary table and statistics styling.
frontend/src/lib/celebrationImageComposi: Utility for compositing a selfie with a Polaroid-style frame and overlay badge, plus helpers for loading images and converting files to data URLs.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryShare.ts: Provides helpers to share monthly memory images via Web Share API with fallbacks for download, social links, and clipboard copy.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, clearing, and listing month-tagged image data URLs in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/months.ts: Defines the list of months and a Month type based on that list.
frontend/src/lib/yearlySummaryCheckboxSt: Stores, loads, validates, and clears yearly summary checkbox state using localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider setup.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboard.tsx: Defines the goals dashboard page with goal categories, UI interactions, and monthly assignment features.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, plugins, and global design tokens.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-side tooling with ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config setting React plugin, env, alias paths, dev server proxy, and build output.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, issues, and the goal to fix an unwanted congrats modal behavior.
